Package com.example.bubbletracksapp

package com.example.bubbletracksapp
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Admin
    Admin class to manage administrative actions like deleting events and profiles from Firestore and handling related updates for both events and profiles.
    AdminEntrantListAdapter
    Custom adapter to display and manage a list of entrants for the admin view.
    AdminFacilityAdapter
    Custom adapter to display a list of facilities.
    AdminFacilityViews
    AdminFacilityViews is an activity that displays a list of facilities in a ListView.
    AdminFragment
    A simple Fragment subclass.
    AdminProfileViews
    AdminProfileViews is an activity that displays a list of user profiles in a ListView.
    AppEventAdapter
    Class that updates what the user sees on the screen for their waitlist and registered list
    AppUserEventScreenGenerator
    This is a class that displays a user's waitlist/invited list/registered list depending on what needs to be displayed.
    BrowseEventsAdminAdapter
     
    BrowseEventsScreenGenerator
     
    CancelledListAdapter
    Adapter between cancelled entrant and array of entrants
    Entrant
     
    EntrantActivity
    This is a class for the entrants' activities with events
    EntrantDB
    Holds database for entrant
    EntrantEditActivity
    This class allows an entrant to update their profile information.
    EntrantFragment
    A simple Fragment subclass.
    EntrantListAdapter
    Adapter between entrant and entrant list
    EntrantTest
     
    EntrantViewActivity
    this class is an activity that allows an entrant to view the event details
    Event
    this tracks the information of a given event
    EventDB
    Holds database for event
    EventHostListAdapter
    Adapter between event host and the event list
    EventTest
     
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
    ExampleUnitTest
    Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
    Facility
    this tracks the information of a given facility
    FacilityDB
    Holds database for Facility
    FirstFragment
     
    Invitation
    Display button for the entrant to accept or decline Entrant
    InvitedListAdapter
    Adapter between invited entrants and the entrant list
    MainActivity
    Main Activity for the user.
    NotificationDB
    Hold database for notification sending and receiving
    Notifications
    Class for holding notifications
    OrganizerActivity
    this class is an activity that allows an organizer to create an event
    OrganizerActivityTest
    this class tests the UI for OrganizerActivity class incomplete - cannot test checkbox due to animation cannot test image picker and location as espresso does not provide a way to interact with those API
    OrganizerEditActivity
    Allows the organizer to sample N entrants from the waitlist.
    OrganizerEditFacilityActivity
     
    OrganizerEntrantListActivity
    Organizer actions for entrants in waitlists.
    OrganizerEventHosting
    Hold event that organizer is hosting
    OrganizerFacilityActivity
    this class is an activity that allows organizers to create a facility
    OrganizerFacilityActivityTest
    Class tests the UI for Organizer Facility Activity Test
    OrganizerFragment
    A simple Fragment subclass.
    OrganizerLocationsMap
    Creates a map with the locations of the entrants of the given event.
    OrganizerManageActivity
    this class is an activity that allows organizers to manage their facility
    OrganizerNotificationActivity
    Organizer sends notifications to chosen entrants to sign up for events through checkboxes
    QRGenerator
    Hold ability to create QR code Organizer use
    QRScanner
    this class is an activity that allows a user to scan a QR Code
